about_the_game:
Calling all heroes! Prepare yourself for an epic battle in this captivating blend of real-time strategy and tower defense! Build, defend, and triumph as you strategically place towers, manage resources, and upgrade your arsenal to fend off relentless waves of enemies.

Features

  • With distinctive upgrades in your hands, choose your own path to defeat the enemies.
  • Unique playthrough. No two games are the same!
  • NG+ new game mode. Higher difficulty with stronger enemies.
  • Score ranking. Challenge yourself to be the best. Speedrun anyone?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphic card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 or above
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5 or i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
